mapper.insert: insert into repository (organize_id, name, path, repository_type, owner_id, credential_id, clone_path, default_branch, visibility, status, last_synced_at, created_at, updated_at, description) values (#{organizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repositoryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{credentialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clonePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visibility,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastSyncedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

organize_id = #{organizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
